thread.section_title: Life Style Sports Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Life Style Sports | lifestylesports.com
thread.title: Jerry Kelly
thread.title_full: Life Style Sports reviewed by Jerry Kelly

author: Jerry Kelly
title: Jerry Kelly
text: The sales assistant quickly understood the product I needed which was not in stock. I ordered it, got the despatch advice that night and confirmation of its availability the next morning. The product spec met my needs perfectly. I was looking for trekking shoes rather than runners but not boots. The ACICS are perfect.
